item.description:
For More Info Click Here

Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

5:30PM - Power Hour Workshop (topic TBA). This is exclusive to members of BostonAREIA. This Month Local Seasoned Commercial Investor Gail McCarthy will be talking about prospering with Commercial real estate. Visit http://www.bostonarei... for details.

Main Meeting at 6:30 PM -
Jason Gilbert of the Commercial Training Institute -
Monthly Meeting - Jason is the most highly recommended commercial speaker on the circuit! Come learn how some average investors profit BIG, Thanks to the Bail Out and Credit Crunch!

Jason Gilbert is President of the Commercial Training Institute, Inc. in San Diego, CA and teached how to do very specific types of commercial real estate deals that are easier to do than residential deals, but make far more money!

Bring your deals, bring your business cards, bring your comfortable shoes! You'll want to speak to as many people as possible during our forced networking. And we'll make sure we identify the people you want and need to speak to at the beginning of the evening, so you don't miss anyone who can help you build your business!

Be sure to be at this EVENT!



Location: Best Western, 380 Winter St, Waltham, Ma
Free to Boston AREIA members (please see website for details - http://www.BostonAREI..., Visitors only $25 at the door.

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association January Meetup
